short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A satellite imagery calendar by DigitalGlobe

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Enjoy a striking satellite image of our changing planet each time you open a new tab, with a monthly calendar at the forefront.

See the world from space, every time you open a new tab. With this digital calendar, experience images from around the world, captured by DigitalGlobeâ€™s constellation of satellites, beneath your monthly calendar. See an image you like? Click the download button to save a jpeg file.
